description_html:
Fitting tables is a range of low coffee tables that can be used both independently
as well as in clusters.
Each piece features a different height and top size, while the legs design
allows the table tops to overlap and be arranged in many different ways.
One table features a marble top with chamfered edges, in order to keep
the same edge thickness of all the other elements.
Frank Lloyd Wright buildings inspired the idea of embracing different surface
heights in a coffee table, while offering a variety of functions and create
playfulness. This intention translates in a series of pieces that can be of
flexible use, from coffee tables to planters to display system - yet affordable
and customizable in different configurations..and finishes.
The glass version is entirely made out of glass.
The use of this material really expresses the product simplicity, while being
very graphical in its context.
These metal version features raw steel, with clear matte top coat. All the
metal edges are hand polished, celebrating craft. One of the table tops is
made out of carrara marble, with chamfered edges, in order to keep the
same edge thickness of all the other elements.
